description:
A very spacious, charming one bedroom with renovated kitchen, a very large living room, a large dining room and bathroom in a historic townhouse in the heart of the West Village. This great apartment, calm, original wood floor, fire place in the dining room and in the bedroom. One side is facing the street and the other side is facing a very quiet courtyard. perfect to experience the West Village lifestyle. 
The apartment takes the entire third floor of the townhouse.
name: Very Spacious One Bedroom Apt in Private Townhouse
review: The host canceled this reservation 22 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
